detaileddescription.para: ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 10Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 2Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 6Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 8Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 15Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 20Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 25Hz
ID to represent bmm150 datarate to 30Hz
This element is used for error handling, User not allowed to use it
enum values to represent Manetometer datarate modes
ID to represent bmm150 Powermode to normal
ID to represent bmm150 Powermode to forced
ID to represent bmm150 Powermode to suspend
ID to represent bmm150 Powermode to sleep
This element is used for error handling, User not allowed to use it
enum values to represent Manetometer power modes
ID to represent bmm150 Presetmode to lowpower
ID to represent bmm150 Presetmode to regular
ID to represent bmm150 Presetmode to highaccuracy
ID to represent bmm150 Presetmode to enhanced
This element is used for error handling, User not allowed to use it
enum values to represent Manetometer preset modes
ID to represents bmm150 magnetometer sensor
This Specifies maximum number of enum elements and it is used only for error handling
enum values to represent Manetometer types supported

briefdescription.para: Function to DeInitialize the magnetometer sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
Magnetometer De-initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bmm150Utils_uninitialize error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to read the Datarate of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
variable to store datarate of the sensor
Getting data rate success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting data rate other than Magnetometer_DataRate_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to read the powermode of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
variable to be update the powermode
Getting power mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting power mode other than Magnetometer_PowerMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to read the preset mode of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
variable to store the presetMode of the sensor
Getting preset mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting preset mode other than Magnetometer_PresetMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the Magnetometer sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
Magnetometer initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bmm150Utils_initialize error codes.
This function needs to be called before calling any other Magnetometer API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to Read the magnetometer sensor data referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
Parameter in which the magnetometer XYZ data gets collected
Reading Magnetometer xyzLsbdata success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL pointer.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer readMagData or Bmm150Utils_remapAxis API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

Whenever there is an overflow in any axis this API will return the maximum value the sensor could read for that axis below are the maximum value the sensor could read x-axis - 1500, y-axis - 1500, z-axis - 2500

briefdescription.para: Function to read micro tesla xyz value from the magnetometer referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
Parameter in which the magnetometer XYZ data gets collected in micro tesla
Reading Magnetometer xyzTesladata success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL pointer.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer readMagData or Bmm150Utils_remapAxis API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

Whenever there is an overflow in any axis this API will return the maximum value the sensor could read for that axis below are the maximum value the sensor could read x-axis - 20800, y-axis - 20800, z-axis - 40000

briefdescription.para: Function to set the Datarate of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
Datarate to be set to the sensor
Setting data rate success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting data rate other than Magnetometer_DataRate_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the powermode of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
powermode to be set to the sensor
Setting power mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting power mode other than Magnetometer_PowerMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the preset mode of the Magnetometer sensor.

parameterdescription.para: handle of the Magnetometer object
presetMode to be set to the sensor
Setting preset mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting preset mode other than Magnetometer_PresetMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmm150LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

detaileddescription.para: The interface header exports advance Sensor API's which are used to Initialize Magnetometer sensor, Configure Power modes, Data rate & preset mode. Also has API's for reading sensor values & Mode Settings.
